name: The Inflatables
description:
The Inflatables is a 2-player split-screen battle to the death made at TOJam 12. It's Quake meets that blueberry girl in Willy Wonka.

Requires 2 gamepads (Xbox 360 controllers recommended).

Made in 2017 by members of Asteroid Base and Vertex Pop (Jamie Tucker, Matt Hammill, Mobeen Fikree and Robby Duguay).
